1.0.0.name: connect20/MD_AjaxScroll
1.0.0.description: Do you want to drastically increase your conversion rate? MD AjaxScroll Product extension helps your customer getting straight to the point by reducing the number of clicks before reaching the product details, improves your e-commerce website performance

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
